metadata.Title: CVE-2019-1010174 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: CImg The CImg Library v.2.3.3 and earlier is affected by: command injection. The impact is: RCE. The component is: load_network() function. The attack vector is: Loading an image from a user-controllable url can lead to command injection, because no string sanitization is done on the url. The fixed version is: v.2.3.4.

criterions.comment: gmic package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
